May 23, 2013 - 硬件问题

edac

相关的操作，开启关闭log

cat /sys/module/edac_core/parameters/edac_mc_log_ue
cat /sys/module/edac_core/parameters/edac_mc_log_ce

监控error数量方法

root@n24-029-138:~# cat /sys/devices/system/edac/mc/mc0/ce_count
